DataElement.preferredName: Neuroblastoma Hematologic Post Induction Recovery Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the date of hematologic recovery.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A neuroblastic tumor characterized by the presence of neuroblastic cells, the absence of ganglion cells, and the absence of a prominent Schwannian stroma formation._Pertaining to or related to the blood and blood-forming organs._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._The act of bringing about something._A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Neuroblastoma is a specific type of neuroblastic tumor which is characterized by the presense of neuroblastic cells forming groups or nests separated by delicate stromal septa without prominent Schwannian stroma. (Adapted from WHO.)

Concepts.definition: A malignant neuroblastic tumor characterized by the presence of neuroblastic cells, the absence of ganglion cells, and the absence of a prominent Schwannian stroma formation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to or related to the blood and blood-forming organs.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:The act of bringing about something.:A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to or related to the blood and blood-forming organs.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
The act of bringing about something.
A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Workflow and Registration Status Changed per Brenda Duggan; 05.16.18

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
